title: 新手第一次砌機 請指教比意見

replies.msg:
CPU: Intel® Core™ CoffeeLake i5-9400F 2.9GHz 9M Cache 6 Core 6 Thread LGA1151
Motherboard: ASUS ROG STRIX B360-H GAMING
Graphic card: MSI GeForce® GTX 1660 Ti GAMING X 6GB GDDR6
Ram: Corsair Vengeance® LPX 16GB (2x8GB) DDR4 DRAM 3000MHz C15 Memory Kit - Black (CMK16GX4M2B3000C15) (想問2400mhz or 2666mhz夠唔夠?)
HDD: Seagate Barracuda® 2TB 7200rpm 64MB 3.5 Inch HDD (唔知邊隻好)
SSD: Samsung 970 EVO Series - 250GB PCIe NVMe - M.2 SSD
PSU: Cooler Master MWE 650 80Plus Gold 650W Full Modular PSU (唔係好知要幾多所以預多)
Case: Cooler Master MasterBox K500L

Budget around 7000-8000hkd 主要都係打機 Apex,pubg果類 少玩大作單機game
想問下大家有d咩位可以慳budget或者轉d咩會更好
另外想問洗唔洗另外再加cooler 風扇果d
thanks a lot

B360超唔到，2666已經夠
火牛轉Corsair rm650x
機箱轉fractal define c
ssd轉970 evo plus 250gb

Hdd轉wd blue 1tb
好似係dm黎

quote.msg:
B360超唔到，2666已經夠
火牛轉Corsair rm650x
機箱轉fractal define c
ssd轉970 evo plus 250gb

replies.msg: 唔該曬🙆🏿‍♂️ 轉機箱既原因係咩呀 因為我都係睇樣

唔清楚你想盡慳定買貴
盡慳的話可以轉
asrock b360m pro4
2666 ram
ssd 轉 wd black sn750
因為你張顯示卡RECOMMENDED PSU都只係450 想預鬆d同慳d買隻500/550既銅牛足矣 例如MASTERWATT Bronze 550 or Corsair CX 550M
